document.full_text: plane maker boeing co  said on friday it had confirmed an order for 15 next generation 737s with turkish airlines. the order would be worth more than $1.2 billion, on the basis of the average list price of the planes.
document.title: boeing, turkish airlines sign order for 15 planes
lines_and_colors: plane maker boeing co  said on friday it had confirmed an order for 15 next generation 737s with turkish airlines. the order would be worth more than $1.2 billion, on the basis of the average list price of the planes.
